verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> the second<WH8145> time<WH6113>, while he was yet shut up in the court<WH2691> of the prison<WH4307>, saying<WH559>,
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> the maker<WH6213> there<WH3068>, the Lord that formed<WH3335> it<WH3559>, to establish it<WH3068>; the Lord is his name<WH8034>;
Call<WH7121> unto me<WH6030>, and I will answer you<WH5046>, and show you great<WH1419> and mighty things<WH1219>, which you know not<WH3045>.

For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, concerning the houses<WH1004> of this city<WH5892>, and concerning the houses<WH1004> of the kings<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, which are thrown down<WH5422> by the mounts<WH5550>, and by the sword<WH2719>;

They come<WH935> to fight<WH3898> with the Chaldeans<WH3778>, but it is to fill<WH4390> them with the dead bodies<WH6297> of men<WH120>, whom I have slain<WH5221> in my anger<WH639> and in my fury<WH2534>, and for all whose wickedness<WH7451> I have hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from this city<WH5892>.
Behold<WH5927>, I will bring it health<WH724> and cure<WH4832>, and I will cure<WH7495> them<WH1540>, and will reveal unto them the abundance<WH6283> of peace<WH7965> and truth<WH571>.
And I will cause the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and the captivity<WH7622> of Israel<WH3478> to return<WH7725>, and will build<WH1129> them<WH7223>, as at the first.

And I will cleanse<WH2891> them from all their iniquity<WH5771>, by which they have sinned<WH2398> against me<WH5545>; and I will pardon all their iniquities<WH5771>, by which they have sinned<WH2398>, and by which they have transgressed against me<WH6586>.

And it shall be to me a name<WH8034> of joy<WH8342>, a praise<WH8416> and a honor<WH8597> before all the nations<WH1471> of the earth<WH776>, which shall hear<WH8085> all the good<WH2896> that I do<WH6213> unto them<WH6342>: and they shall fear and tremble<WH7264> for all the goodness<WH2896> and for all the prosperity<WH7965> that I procure unto it<WH6213>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Again there shall be heard<WH8085> in this place<WH4725>, which you say<WH559> shall be desolate<WH2720> without man<WH120> and without animal<WH929>, even in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, that are desolate<WH8074>, without man<WH120>, and without inhabitant<WH3427>, and without animal<WH929>,

The voice<WH6963> of joy<WH8342>, and the voice<WH6963> of gladness<WH8057>, the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860>, and the voice<WH6963> of the bride<WH3618>, the voice<WH6963> of them that shall say<WH559>, Praise<WH3034> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: for the Lord<WH3068> is good<WH2896>; for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever<WH5769>: and of them that shall bring<WH935> the sacrifice of praise<WH8426> into the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>. For I will cause to return<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of the land<WH776>, as at the first<WH7223>, says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Again in this place<WH4725>, which is desolate<WH2720> without man<WH120> and without animal<WH929>, and in all the cities<WH5892> there<WH5116>, shall be a habitation of shepherds<WH7462> causing their flocks<WH6629> to lie down<WH7257>.

In the cities<WH5892> of the mountains<WH2022>, in the cities<WH5892> of the valley<WH8219>, and in the cities<WH5892> of the south<WH5045>, and in the land<WH776> of Benjamin<WH1144>, and in the places about<WH5439> Jerusalem<WH3389>, and in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, shall the flocks<WH6629> pass again<WH5674> under the hands<WH3027> of him that tells<WH4487> them<WH559>, says the Lord<WH3068>.

Behold<WH3117>, the days come<WH935>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, that I will perform<WH6965> that good<WH2896> thing<WH1697> which I have promised<WH1696> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and to the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>.

In those days<WH3117>, and at that time<WH6256>, will I cause the Branch<WH6780> of righteousness<WH6666> to grow up<WH6779> unto David<WH1732>; and he shall execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and righteousness<WH6666> in the land<WH776>.

In those days<WH3117> shall Judah<WH3063> be saved<WH3467>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> shall live<WH7931> safely<WH983>: and this is the name with which she shall be called<WH7121>, The Lord our righteousness<WH3072>.
For thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; David<WH1732> shall never<WH3808> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> to sit<WH3427> upon the throne<WH3678> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>;

Neither shall the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> want<WH3772> a man<WH376> before<WH6440> me to offer<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930>, and to kindle<WH6999> food offerings<WH4503>, and to do<WH6213> sacrifice<WH2077> continually<WH3117>.
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; If you can break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> of the day<WH3117>, and my covenant<WH1285> of the night<WH3915>, and that there should not be day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> in their season<WH6256>;

Then may also my covenant<WH1285> be broken<WH6565> with David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>, that he should not have a son<WH1121> to reign<WH4427> upon his throne<WH3678>; and with the Levites<WH3881> the priests<WH3548>, my ministers<WH8334>.

As the army<WH6635> of heaven<WH8064> cannot be numbered<WH5608>, neither the sand<WH2344> of the sea<WH3220> measured<WH4058>: so will I multiply<WH7235> the seed<WH2233> of David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>, and the Levites<WH3881> that minister unto me<WH8334>.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came to Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Consider<WH7200> you not what this people<WH5971> have spoken<WH1696>, saying<WH559>, The two<WH8147> families<WH4940> which the Lord<WH3068> has chosen<WH977>, he has even cast them off<WH3988>? thus they have despised<WH5006> my people<WH5971>, that they should be no more a nation<WH1471> before them<WH6440>.
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; If my covenant<WH1285> be not with day<WH3119> and night<WH3915>, and if I have not appointed<WH7760> the ordinances<WH2708> of heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>;

Then<WH1571> will I cast away<WH3988> the seed<WH2233> of Jacob<WH3290>, and David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>, so that I will not take<WH3947> any of his seed<WH2233> to be rulers<WH4910> over the seed<WH2233> of Abraham<WH85>, Isaac<WH3446>, and Jacob<WH3290>: for I will cause their captivity<WH7622> to return<WH7725>, and have mercy on them<WH7355>.
